text: The defending champion was Elena Baltacha, but she did not compete this year. Lucie Hradecká defeated Irina Falconi, 6–4, 6–4. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==External links== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Dow Corning Tennis Classic - Singles Category:Dow Corning Tennis Classic
title: 2011 Dow Corning Tennis Classic – Singles
